algorithm_technique: Iterate through columns and greedily increment elements to satisfy the strictly increasing condition.
problem_summary_simple: Make each column in a grid strictly increasing by incrementing elements.
problem_summary_technical: Greedily iterates through grid columns, incrementing elements to ensure `grid[i+1][j] > grid[i][j]`.
key_insights: The problem can be solved column by column independently.
For each column, a greedy approach works: ensure each element is strictly greater than the previous one by the minimum necessary increments.
